Workbench 0.0.1 Released

release
06 Jan 2015 patrickoleary

Hey! After many months of hard work by Workbench’s contributors, we’re excited to announce the first major release of the project. v0.0.1 is finally here! While the list of improvements and bug fixes is quite lengthy, here are the highlights (thanks to @patrickoleary:

  • WebGL Support
  • Dynamic Rendering
  • Dynamic Probing

Take a look at the Upgrading page in the docs for more detailed information.
